item.description:
New players are graciously welcome to come out and find out just what in tarnation this D&D thing is all about.

To attend this event, please bring the following: Nothing.

This event is specifically designed for new players to come out and have fun playing the game with other new players so that they don't feel intimidated by more experienced players. Everything you need to have fun will be provided.

Each player will have their choice of a premade character (first come, first choice).

The person running the game will be Tas who has 10+ years of experience in the D&D game. Don't worry if you've had difficulties learning from others, I'm patient, helpful, and my #1 priority is for new players to enjoy themselves.

Couples with non-gaming partners are welcome, but be warned, Tas may be strict with the more-experienced partner. :)

For experienced players who wish to know, this will be a one-shot game from a Wizard's of the Coast Published adventure.

Once I find out the location of people who wish to play, I will set up a location, which will probably be a game store.

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: August Beginners' D&D Game
